main.name: Thanh Nguyen
main.bio: I'm a recent graduate Computer Science from University of California, Berkeley. I enjoy music and cooking beside coding. I recently into Cryptocurrency and Blockchain development.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Relevant courses: The Structure and Interpretation of Computer Programs| Data Structure| Great Ideas of Computer Architecture (Machine Structures) | Computer Security | Efficient Algorithms and Intractable Problem| Introduction to Database Systems | Introduction to Artificial Intelligence| Introduction to the Internet: Architecture and Protocol| Operating Systems and System Programming | Designing Information Devices and Systems II| Front-End Web Architecture|

work.title: Software Engineer Internship
work.description: Participated in a team of 4 to build a website for insurance aspect of the company using sprint planning. Created a responsive front end using Bootstrap, Pug and designed schema using NoSQL databases MongoDB . Web Scraping with Selenium to get information to expand the business connection

projects.title: Build Your Own World
projects.category: I and my partner Jerry Lai wrote a game for 2 players with random world using Java and StdDraw.

projects.title: Online Learning Tool
projects.category: Our group of 4 built a online learning platform that help student to manage tasks using React. It works with Google Calendar API.

projects.title: Share Wallet
projects.category: This is my first smart contract. An on-chain wallet smart contract, which can store funds and let users withdraw, give allowance to other, specific user-addresses.

quotes.text: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter and those who matter don't mind.
